explains: n. 联盟，同盟；加拿大联邦
wordGroup: articles of confederation 十三州邦联宪法（美国第一部宪法）

sentences.en: The council voted to disband and re-form as a confederation.
sentences.cn: 该政务会投票决定解散，再以联盟的形式重组。

sentences.en: The Confederation of British Industry, a business lobby group, estimates that 15 billion pounds could be saved by treating chronic diseases at home.
sentences.cn: 英国工业联合会，一个商业游说团体，估计通过在家中治疗慢性疾病可以节省15亿英镑。

sentences.en: The Confederation of British Industry surveyed 694 businesses and organisations across the public and private sectors, which together employ 2.4 million people.
sentences.cn: 英国工业联合会对公共和私营部门的694家企业和组织进行了调查，这些企业和组织共有员工240万人。
